--- product_code: ls02 description: 10mm Landsknecht Pikeniere (Pikemen) title: 10mm Landsknecht Pikeniere (Pikemen) breadcrumb: Pikeniere (Pikemen) name: Landsknecht Pikeniere (Pikemen) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: TS6SR2VGK2TS6 ---

All Landsknechte in a regiment were trained in the use of the pike, fighting in pike square formations developed by the Swiss in the early 15th century.

This is a Pikeniere (Pikemen) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one standard bearer/musician strip (ls02a), eight line strips (a mix of ls02b–e) and six column strips (a mix of ls02f–h).
